Sentencas: This work is based on the hybrid system emulator plant developed by the Thermochemical Power Group (TPG) of the University of Genoa.
Titulo: Emulator Rig for SOFC Hybrid Systems: Temperature and Power Control with a Real-Time Software

Sentencas: This rig is composed of a 100kW microturbine coupled with high temperature fuel cell emulation devices.
Titulo: Emulator Rig for SOFC Hybrid Systems: Temperature and Power Control with a Real-Time Software

Sentencas: A real-time model is used for components not physically present in the laboratory (solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), reformer, anodic circuit, off-gas burner, cathode blower).
Titulo: Emulator Rig for SOFC Hybrid Systems: Temperature and Power Control with a Real-Time Software

Sentencas: It is necessary to evaluate thermodynamic and electrochemical performance related to SOFC systems.
Titulo: Emulator Rig for SOFC Hybrid Systems: Temperature and Power Control with a Real-Time Software

Sentencas: Using an User Datagram Protocol (UDP) based connection with the control/acquisition software, it generates a hardware-in-the-loop (HIL) facility for hybrid system emulation.
Titulo: Emulator Rig for SOFC Hybrid Systems: Temperature and Power Control with a Real-Time Software

Sentencas: Temperature, pressure, and mass flow rate at the recuperator outlet and machine rotational speed are measured in the plant and used as inputs for the model.
Titulo: Emulator Rig for SOFC Hybrid Systems: Temperature and Power Control with a Real-Time Software

Sentencas: The turbine outlet temperature (TOT) calculated by the model is fed into the machine control system and the turbine electric load is changed to match the model TOT values (effective plant/model coupling to avoid modifications on microturbine controller).
Titulo: Emulator Rig for SOFC Hybrid Systems: Temperature and Power Control with a Real-Time Software

Sentencas: Different tests were carried out to analyze hybrid system technology through the interaction between an experimental plant and a real-time model.
Titulo: Emulator Rig for SOFC Hybrid Systems: Temperature and Power Control with a Real-Time Software

Sentencas: Double step and double ramp tests of current and fuel provided the system dynamic response.
Titulo: Emulator Rig for SOFC Hybrid Systems: Temperature and Power Control with a Real-Time Software
